short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remedia is a crowdsourcing platform designed to fight clickbate titles, fake news and false claims

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read the news without clickbait titles or provide your own!

Wouldn't it be fun to be able to replace clickbait titles served by news companies? Also, be able to share them with your friends?

This extension allows you to do that and much more:
* Reporting of suspicious articles that will be fact-checked by Remedia
* AI powered generation of alternate title that will substitute clickbait titles on webpages in real-time
* Dislike articles
* Read claim reviews about an article while reading it
* View claims made by individuals and trust ratings made by fact-checkers
* and much more

This extension can change the look of webpages if:
* one of the main features of this extension is to fight clickbait titles, if you or another user write an alternative title to a clickbait one, that title will be replaced. The original title will still be visible if you hover the icon
* all DOM elements that are modified will receive one or several circles/badges beside them. The circles notify the user that there is a modification or that there is more info about the article in the crowdsourcing platform Remedia

Remedia is a crowdsourcing social network designed to remediate news articles. 
By installing the Chrome extension you will be able to view all the data generated in the social network while just browsing the internet. If there is data available about a page, a person's profile, or a claim, the extension will warn you and make it available to you in real-time.
If you would like to create such content and make it available to other users feel free to join.
https://remedia.social
